@@ -654,1 +654,1 @@ - *
  • {@code N}, none of the arguments passed to the function are passed as variadic argument
    • + *
  • {@code N}, none of the arguments passed to the function are passed as variadic arguments
    • @@ -658,2 +658,2 @@ - * function, even when none of the arguments are passed as variadic arguments (the second case in the list - * above), as this affects the linking process on certain platforms. + * function, even if no variadic argument is passed (the second case in the list + * above), as this might still affect the calling convention on certain platforms. @@ -664,2 +664,2 @@ - * @param index the index indicating the start of the variadic arguments passed to the function described by - * the function descriptor used in conjunction with this linker option. + * @param index the index of the first variadic argument layout in the function descriptor associated + * with a downcall linkage request.
